about.title: IRA Skill Varsity
about.mission: To nurture learners and equip them with tools to succeed.

leadership.name: Natarajan Kandaswamy
leadership.bio: Worked with UNICEF and SOS Villages...

highlights.title: Tirupati Employment Drive (2023)
highlights.description: Successfully trained 2300+ students, facilitated 300+ job placements across diverse industries, empowering learners with in-demand skills and career opportunities

highlights.title: Mega Drive at JNTU Kakinada (2024)
highlights.description: Engaged 14,000+ learners through impactful programs and enabled 1360 successful placements, driving skill development and career growth at scale.
